turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Could you order me a coffee from the Starbucks at Sunset and Crescent Heights in West Hollywood?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a venti ice ice caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, make that with whole milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a venti iced caramel macchiato with whole milk and whipped cream, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i place that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a venti iced caramel macchiato with whole milk and whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks on sunset and crescent heights in west hollywood.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much is that got to cost?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready for pickup in 6 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, could you tell me how much that's going to cost?
